cleaned_text: Spiritual Healer Herb Bath [](/products/spiritual-healer-herb-bath) Spiritual Healer Herb Bath Our Spiritual Healer Herb Bath is the perfect product for spiritual cleansing and restoration. This ancient tradition uses special herbs to impart certain essences conducive to love-getting, money-drawing, protection from evil, or the removal of curses. Instructions for use are simple: steep the herbs in boiling water, strain the mixture, let the liquid cool, and pour it over the body while standing in a wash tub.
